Seorang Pejalan Kaki Meninggal Tertabrak Truk Tanah di Cengkareng
07 Nov 2019, 00:52 by Antara, Clara Maria Tjandra Dewi H.
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Seorang pejalan kaki meninggal tertabrak truk pengangkut tanah di Jalan Utama Raya, depan kampus Bina Sarana Informatika (BSI) Cengkareng, Rabu malam. Korban tewas seketika pada kecelakaan itu dengan kondisi tubuh mengenaskan.
Menurut Kapolsek Cengkareng Khoiri, kecelakaan lalu lintas itu bermula ketika korban sedang berjalan di pinggir Jalan Utama Raya, Cengkareng, Jakarta Barat. Pada saat bersamaan, muncul sebuah truk pengangkut tanah yang melaju dari arah persimpangan Cengkareng menuju Tegal Alur, Jakarta Barat.
Truk yang dikemudikan oleh pengemudi bernama Heri itu kemudian menyenggol korban. Korban pun terjatuh persis di depan roda bagian belakang truk. Akibatnya, tubuh korban terlindas.
Sopr truk tak tahu kalau menyerempet korban. Ia baru sadar telah melindas korban setelah diteriaki oleh warga setempat.
Polisi Unit Kecelakaan Lalu Lintas Satuan Wilayah Jakarta Barat yang datang ke lokasi kemudian pun langsung membawa Heri ke kantor Unit Lakalantas Satwil Jakbar untuk dimintai keterangan. Truk pengangkut tanah yang dikemudikan Heri turut dibawa sebagai barang bukti.
Kecelakaan tersebut sempat membuat kemacetan parah karena sejumlah pengendara melambatkan laju kendaraan di sekitar lokasi. Kemacetan itu diperparah akibat kerumunan warga yang datang melihat ke lokasi kejadian.
Untuk kepentingan autopsi, jasad pejalan kaki yang meninggal akibat tertabrak truk tanah itu dievakuasi ke Rumah Sakit Umum Daerah (RSUD) Tangerang, Banten.

A Pedestrian Died by a Ground Truck in Cengkareng
Nov 7 2019, 00:52 by Antara, Clara Maria Tjandra Dewi H.
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - A pedestrian was killed by a land transport truck on Jalan Utama Raya, in front of the Cengkareng Bina Sarana Informatika (BSI) campus on Wednesday night. The victim died instantly in the accident with a pathetic body condition.
According to the Cengkareng Khoiri police chief, the traffic accident began when the victim was walking on the edge of Jalan Raya Raya, Cengkareng, West Jakarta. At the same time, a land transport truck emerged that drove from the direction of the Cengkareng junction to Tegal Alur, West Jakarta.
The truck driven by the driver named Heri then nudged the victim. The victim also fell right in front of the rear wheels of the truck. As a result, the victim's body was crushed.
The truck driver doesn't know if he grazed the victim. He only realized that he had run over the victim after being yelled at by local residents.
West Jakarta Regional Police Unit Traffic Accident Unit who came to the location then immediately took Heri to the Lakalantas West Jakarta Regional Unit office for questioning. The earth hauling truck driven by Heri was also brought as evidence.
The accident had caused severe traffic congestion because a number of drivers slowed down the speed of the vehicle around the site. The congestion was exacerbated due to the crowd of residents who came to see the scene.
For autopsy purposes, the body of a pedestrian who died as a result of being hit by a ground truck was evacuated to the Tangerang General Hospital (RSUD), Banten.
